title: Extra Reach
content:
Extra Reach Has increased range and can be used to attack from further away. GlaivesHalberdsPikes

Extra Reach is a Weapon Property in Baldur's Gate 3. Extra Reach grants the featured weapon the ability to attack from further away. Weapon Properties grant different weapon types, diverse features that are intrinsic to that specific weapon type.

Extra Reach Information

Has increased range and can be used to attack from further away.
